flawed_nl_solution:

An additional class costs $10 because 7.5 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<7.5*(1+(1/3))=10.0>>10.0
She buys 1 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=1>>1
Her three additional classes cost $10.0 because 1 x 10.0 = <<1*10.0=10.0>>10.0
Her total cost is $85.0 because 75 + 10.0 = <<75+10.0=85.0>>85.0
